attributes.action: if 10years or less no change to state pension
attributes.additional_details:
DISCRIMINATION? between state and civil service pensions , Danny Alexander statement in the house of commons
 to the civil servents, was "if they are 10 years or less from retiring FROM 1ST APRIL 2012 they will not have to work longer, or will there be any detriment to there retirement income THIS SHOULD APPLY TO STATE PENSION AS WELL?
